original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jivhānicchārakaṁ bhuñjanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū jivhā nicchārakam bhuñjanti pe
na jivhā nicchārakam bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca jivhānicchārakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca jivhā nicchārakam bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
